content: Hi all! You may recognize me from Discord, I used to help run the Community Discord and I'm on the Discord Venue Team. Recently I got a job as an Infrastructure Engineer, finding that I knew more about infra than I thought. I'd like to help share some of the load if you'll have me!
hey congrats on the new job and good to see you here :smile:

Speaking for myself, not as part of the team, most teams grant membership to people that already contribute. Said another way, just start helping out — you don't need to be on the team. You can join in our meetings (here in Zulip 10AM Eastern on Wednesday) or look for GitHub issues / PRs tagged as intra.
And if you have questions, we can either point to docs or (unfortunately frequently) help you answer them - in which case we'd love help writing docs :)
